title: Mobile-Based Innovative Language Learning Design: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customized design to meet the job-integrated language learning needs of current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can communicate in the target language for over three hours per week using mobile microlearning in work-based scenarios.
Learners can complete peer feedback-based project deliverables at least twice using collaboration tools.
Learners can establish and execute a self-directed learning plan based on learning analytics reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
